entry.title: The History of Literature Podcast - Mind and Media in the Enlightenment

link.title: The History of Literature Podcast - Mind and Media in the Enlightenment

entry.content: I recently discussed [‘Enlightenment Links’ with Jacke on ‘The History of Literature’ podcast!] (https://www.historyofliterature.com/649-mind-and-media-in-the-enlightenment-with-collin-jennings-mike-recommends-a-moveable-feast-by/) Check it out!
entry.summary: I recently discussed [‘Enlightenment Links’ with Jacke on ‘The History of Literature’ podcast!] (https://www.historyofliterature.com/649-mind-and-media-in-the-enlightenment-with-collin-jennings-mike-recommends-a-moveable-feast-by/) Check it out!

entry.title: Stats + Stories Podcast - “Judging Words by the Company They Keep”

link.title: Stats + Stories Podcast - “Judging Words by the Company They Keep”

entry.content: I was excited to join the Stats + Stories podcast to discuss my book Enlightenment Links as well as why computational methods matter for studying literature.
entry.summary: I was excited to join the Stats + Stories podcast to discuss my book Enlightenment Links as well as why computational methods matter for studying literature.
